name: Shape Shooter (itch) (enekoatxa)
description:
Little 2D top down shooter, developed to learn new skills in game development. Learned skills:

- Basic 2D game fundamentals such as sprite movement, game object destroying, basic enemy AI.

- Basic UI building with animation and sounds.

- Basic save/load system.

- Player feedback: screen shake, sound, particle systems, animations.

- Basic progression system and increasing difficulty system with upgrades for the player and the enemies.

- Basic audio design and music creation.
